title: Miranda inform suspects of their rights

content.question: In Miranda v. Arizona, the United States Supreme Court declared that

choices.label: illegal aliens have the same right to an education as United States citizens
evidence seized during an illegal search cannot be used in court
affirmative action programs cannot employ numerical quotas
police must inform criminal suspects of their constitutional rights before questioning suspects after arrest
the death penalty is constitutional so long as juries are supplied with sentencing guidelines

content.answer: police must inform criminal suspects of their constitutional rights before questioning suspects after arrest
